title: Baixur Gongzhu Zhi Shenmi Baba
synopsis: Hannah (voiced by Gao Mingjue) lost her father since childhood. Everyone said that he had gone to another world. Only Hannah firmly believed that her father was still alive. With a magical feather, Hannah embarked on a journey to find her father alone. She wanted to find the god bird, because the god bird knew the whereabouts of her father. 　　 In the midst of an accidental hit, Hannah broke into the wooden house of the dwarfs in the forest. Knowing Hannah's life experience, Snow White (voiced by Yan Mengmeng) and the dwarves were deeply moved and determined to help Hanna find her father. The group got on the hot air balloon and headed towards the bird island where the sacred bird lives. Along the way, Hannah and the others encountered natural and man-made disasters, but they did not stop moving forward. In the end, they arrived at their destination smoothly and learned that the disappearance of their father and the evil queen (voiced by Lin Lan) are unclear. relationship.(translated from douban)
